Metadata.name: Arcana Localization Fix + Command Menu Fix
Metadata.author: Pixelguin, Tekka
Metadata.description:
Arcana Localization Fix: Corrects a mistranslated Social Link Arcana.
Command Menu Fix: Fixes graphic design errors with the "S. Link" and "Quest" text in the command menu.
Please note that the GameBanana page for this mod contains MAJOR STORY SPOILERS.
